main.name: Logistic Regression and KNN for Breast Cancer
main.description: For this project, Logistic Regression and K-Nearest Neighbour models are compared by predicting between malignant or benign breast cancer cells

overview.title: Dataset and Library
overview.description1a: Scikit Learn's LogisticRegression and KNeighborsClassifier classes were used to create the models.
overview.description1b: The dataset consisted of 569 rows by 32 columns of patient information, including the label which was the Malignant or Benign diagnosis.
overview.description1c: Please find the dataset from the University of California Irvine's Machine Learning Repository, as well as my implementation on Github:
